title: Dylan Michael Gomez
content:
in Meadows Place. He was born January 29, 1992 in Richmond to Johnny and Ariadna Gomez. Dylan was a member of First United Methodist Church in Sugar Land. He worked as a plumber’s assistant. 
  
Survivors include his maternal grandparents, Michael and Elia Ortiz, his daughter, Nora Lee Gomez, his fiancée, Kristin McClung, his father, John Gomez, his uncle, Miguel A. Ortiz and wife Jenna and their children, Emilia, Roma and Ava and a host of other loving family members and friends. He was preceded in death by his mother, Ariadna Gomez.
